casebody.data:
In re Foreclosure of Deed of Trust Executed by Patrick HUNT and Ruth Dixon Hunt, to James T. Lee, Trustee, and Emmco, the Mortgage Service Station, Inc., Beneficiary, Dated August 5, 1998 in the Original Principal Amount of $45,600.00 Recorded in Book 1228 at Page 2153 of the Cleveland County, North Carolina, Public Registry.
Record Owner: Martina Elizabeth Clark (by virtue of Deed recorded in Book 1302, at Page 935 of aforesaid Registry). Liable on Note: Patrick Hunt and Ruth Dixon Hunt.
By: Robert L. Lindsey, Jr., Substitute Trustee. No. 173P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Martina E. Clark, Pro Se. John Whitley, for MorEquity, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by Defendant on the 20th day of March 2006 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30 (substantial constitutional question), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the notice of appeal is

"Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2006."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd day of April 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2006."
